rules.name: Compliance_Skipped
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4) AND (5 OR 6 OR 7) AND ((8 AND 9 AND 12) OR ( 10 AND 11))

Flow.description: DRG Rejected Approval Logic, Contract Draft Status Tracking + legal alerts, CSM Messaging Updates

formulas.name: CSMExec

formulas.description: This give the URL to the associated Account
formulas.name: frml_AccountRecordUrl

formulas.description: pick compliance RR group based on products selected
formulas.name: frml_compliance_group

formulas.description: This gives the URL to the Product, Renewal Opportunity.
formulas.name: frml_ProductRenewalRecordURL

formulas.description: This creates the URL Link to the record dynamically and will work in Prod or Sandbox
formulas.name: frml_recordURL
frml_region_translation
formulas.expression: IF( !ISBLANK(TEXT({!$Record.Account.Region__c})), IF( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Account.Region__c}, 'Americas'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Account.Region__c}, 'LATAM') ), TEXT({!$Record.CreatedBy.Pillar__c}) = 'Platform Distribution', !ISBLANK({!$Record.CreatedBy.ManagerId}) ), IF({!$Record.CreatedBy.Manager.LastName} = 'Lennox', 'Americas East','Americas West'), IF(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Account.Region__c}, 'Middle East and Africa'), 'MENA', TEXT({!$Record.Account.Region__c})) ), Null )

formulas.description: Blank or first and last SE name for ring the gong slack notification
formulas.name: frml_SE_Name

formulas.description: check if opp name contains test
formulas.name: frml_test_opp
formulas.expression: OR( CONTAINS(LOWER({!$Record.Name}), ' test '), LOWER({!$Record.Name})='test', BEGINS(LOWER({!$Record.Name}), 'test '), RIGHT(LOWER({!$Record.Name}), 5) = ' test' )

Flow.label: Opportunity: After Save
